English
In The Wolf of Wall Street DiCaprio plays Belfort, a Long Island penny
stockbroker who served 36 months in prison for defrauding investors in a massive
1990s securities scam that involved widespread corruption on Wall Street and in
the corporate banking world, including shoe designer Steve Madden.
